scheduled_maintenances.name: GoToMeeting/Webinar/Training & OpenVoice StatusPage migration to status.goto.com

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

GoTo Status Page Consolidation Notification As part of our commitment to providing exceptional service and reliability to our customers, the GoTo status pages will be consolidated into a single status page, covering all products in the GoTo portfolio. Following this date, updates will come solely from status.goto.com. You are receiving this notification because your email address was previously subscribed to a Status Page being migrated, and to continue to receive status notifications, your action is required. Date and Time: August 20 2024, 12:00 PM to 4:00 PM UTC Purpose: This maintenance is to enhance communications about system performance and stability. Duration: All maintenance will be performed within the 4-hour maintenance window. What to expect: All GoTo’s product status pages will be consolidated to status.goto.com. Customers utilizing any of GoTo's status pages will potentially experience a 5-minute downtime if using any of the old page links instead of the new consolidated status page at status.goto.com IMPORTANT: ACTION REQUIRED to confirm your subscription If you have not yet confirmed your email subscription, you will receive a subscription confirmation email from noreply@statuspage.io with the subject [GoTo status] . That email requires your action to maintain your subscription to GoTo’s new status page. If you were previously subscribed by SMS or Slack, please subscribe to GoTo’s new consolidated status page at https://status.goto.com/. SMS and Slack subscriptions will not be automatically renewed. Please check your inbox for the confirmation email requiring action.

As part of our commitment to providing exceptional service and reliability to our customers, our GoTo status pages will undergo service maintenance on the following date and time listed below. Our team will be taking all appropriate actions to minimize service interruptions during this event. Date and Time: August 20 2024, 12:00 PM to 4:00 PM UTC Purpose: This maintenance is to enhance communications about system performance and stability. Duration: All maintenance will be performed within the 4-hour maintenance window. What to expect: All GoTo’s product status pages will be consolidated to status.goto.com. Any customers who are utilizing any of GoTo's status pages will potentially experience a 5-minute downtime if using any of the old page links instead of the new status.goto.com IMPORTANT: ACTION REQUIRED to confirm your statuspage subscription Furthermore, customers will receive a subscription confirmation email from noreply@statuspage.io entitled [GoTo status] Subscription confirmation during the week of August 5th, 2024. Rest assured, this is a legitimate email and requires your action to maintain your subscription to our new status page. Note: SMS and Slack subscriptions will not be migrated. If you wish to use SMS instead of email you are free to remove your email subscription and subscribe with SMS instead. And if you want to continue with your Slack integration you will need to re-subscribe yourself. Subscription confirmation Thanks for subscribing to GoTo status updates. This address will receive email notifications whenever incidents are reported or updated. To manage which components you receive notifications for: Click on the green Manage your subscription button, or go directly to the site status.goto.com and subscribe yourself. We want to thank you for your patience and understanding during this change.
